target: We can try El Shaddai. How many nights will you be staying, and with how many people?
context: <user> I'm looking for something to do tonight. Maybe the theatre? <system> There are 5 theatres, 4 in the centre and 1 in the south. There are no fees listed, would you like information on any of these? <user> Can you give me any one in the centre, and give me phone number and postcode? <system> you can try adc theatre, phone number is 01223300085 and postcode cb58as <user> That is great can you also find me a hotel with a 0 star in the same area as the theatre <system> I have two choices for you. Do you need parking? <user> No, I do not need parking but need wifi while in the hotel. <system> Let me look for a hotel with wifi.<user> OK thank you, I would like the room for Thursday. <system> I have two options with internet do you have a price reference?<user> I don't have a preference, please just pick one. <system>
